question:
[Danielle] just had a baby and presented the baby proudly to the new maternal grandmother, [Morgan]. [Danielle] went shoe shopping with her sister [Ouida]. [Dale] took his sister [Valerie] too the zoo but his sister [Joy] could n't come because she had to work. [Brian] went out for pizza with his sister [Morgan] and his daughter [Linda]. [Debra] asked her daughter, [Valerie], if she would like to go to a movie with her on Saturday night. [Scott] wanted to go to dinner with his grandmother, [Debra]. [Barbara] took her brother [Scott] to the park, but left her sister [Linda] at home.
Question: How is [Joy] related to [Ouida]?
